javadoc: Class to manage the tabbed panel for field formats.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: formatMgr
params.comment: the format manager to display tabbed panels for.

methods.javadoc: Resets the currently tabbed model to its default format.
methods.name: resetFormat
methods.comment: Resets the currently tabbed model to its default format.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the current tab to the given model.
@param factory the format model to make the current tab.
methods.name: setSelectedFieldFactory
methods.comment: Sets the current tab to the given model.

params.name: factory
params.comment: the format model to make the current tab.

methods.javadoc: Resets all the format models to their default formats
methods.name: resetAllFormats
methods.comment: Resets all the format models to their default formats

methods.javadoc: Returns the a FieldHeaderLocation for the given point within the header.
methods.name: getFieldHeaderLocation
methods.comment: Returns the a FieldHeaderLocation for the given point within the header.

methods.javadoc: Returns the field header tab component.
methods.name: getHeaderTab
methods.comment: Returns the field header tab component.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the tab lock so the tab won't reposition.
@param b true to set the lock, false to release the lock.
methods.name: setTabLock
methods.comment: Sets the tab lock so the tab won't reposition.

params.name: b
params.comment: true to set the lock, false to release the lock.

name: FieldHeader
comment: Class to manage the tabbed panel for field formats.
